summary: A massacre survivor (A.J. Cook) studies serial killers under a famous expert (Bruce Payne), but her classmates soon start dying at the hands of a Jack the Ripper copycat.
cast: A.J. Cook|Bruce Payne|Ryan Northcott|Claire Keim|Derek Hamilton|Daniella Evangelista|Emmanuelle Vaugier|Kelly Brook|Jürgen Prochnow|Courtenay J. Stevens|Robin Collins|Leanne Buchanan|Michael Copley|Sean Whale|Crystal Dalman|Josh Byer|Stuart Adamson|Christy Sandback|Dominika Juillet|Bruce Pinard|Denis Corbett|Yolanda Corbett|Raymond Law|Olga Lounová|Robin Miller
keywords: character name as title|characters murdered one by one|nickname as title|teenage|teen slasher
director: Director: John Eyres (as John E. Eyres)
title: Ripper, llamada desde el infierno
